name: Roadmapping for Impact Funding
description: In this video, a panel of experts in the crypto field discuss the significance of road mapping. They highlight how road maps facilitate collaboration, coordination, and knowledge sharing among stakeholders. The panelists debate the visual representation of road maps, with some advocating for detailed graphs while others emphasize concise and actionable information. The video emphasizes the value of road mapping in aligning stakeholders and driving impactful science and technology advancements in the crypto industry.
